title: Eleni Karaindrou - Elegy Of The Uprooting (2008) [DVD9 NTSC] {EC
description:
This torrent is a gift from the Russian Federation and Eastern Block nations whose internal torrent networks are both vast and supporting content of a very high level of quality.

I actually copied the .VOB files in this torrent to a single file (just use copy /b file1+file2+ ... +filen something.mpg) just to get an overall printout of the DVD's makeup as well, I prefer a single file over all those VOB's! [I have never used my DVD drive though it is my right to do so]
